title: DreamWorks: Inside the Studio

abstract: Venture behind the scenes and uncover the history and creative process behind some of the world's most popular animated films.
description: Venture behind the scenes and uncover the history and creative process behind some of the world's most popular animated films with this fascinating exploration of the DreamWorks Animation creative studio.  Join special international DreamWorks guests Bill Damaschke (Chief Creative Officer), Kendal Cronkhite (Production Designer), Christophe Lautrette (Production Designer), Jason Schleifer (Head of Character Animation) and Doug Cooper (Visual Effects Supervisor) as they take us inside the DreamWorks phenomenon and explore how the animation and artwork has evolved over the history of the studio's many hit titles.  Offering key insights into the creative history of the studio and exploring the artwork that has inspired artists and animators all over the world, these talented DreamWorks creatives will also examine the joint curatorial process behind showcasing the art form in the groundbreaking 'DreamWorks Animation: The Exhibition' shown at ACMI from 10th April to 5th October 2014.
